name: alone (itch) (Coffee Cat Studios)
description:
alone is a short technical demo created overnight. The idea was to test the following components:

  • HQ Assets (office + interiors).
  • Dynamic text (english - español)
  • Custom subtitles system.
  • Basic environment interaction.
  • Persistance.
  • Music.
  • SFX (these don't work, yikes).

Although it is a tech-demo/prototype, I still wanted to include something in here. So I wrote a short love letter, and told it through some abstract concepts!
